project.name: AstroGrid CEA Services
project.description:
The applications integration component provides an implementation of the Common Execution Architecture (CEA). The implementation consists of
  • The Server Framework - this is a common library used to build the server components, know as Common Execution Connectors (CEC), that are used as adaptors for various classes of application
  • A set of CECs
    • For legacy command line applications
    • For legacy HTTP GET/POST applications
  • A small client library to assist in communicating with a CEC
